Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.openbmc_verify_fanutil_functionality.openbmc_verify_fanutil_functionality

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_base import TestBase

import re



[docs]class OpenbmcVerifyFanutil(TestBase):

[docs]    def __init__(self):
        super(OpenbmcVerifyFanutil, self).__init__()
        self.stress_count = self.test_control['stress_count']
        self.desired_percentage_to_set = self.test_control[
            'desired_percentage_to_set'
        ]
        self.fan_number_to_set = self.test_control['fan_number_to_set']
        self.zone_number_to_set = self.test_control['zone_number_to_set']



[docs]    def execute(self):
        self.log_info("This is the OpenBMC fan-util functionality test")

        stress_count = self.stress_count
        for n in range(1, stress_count + 1):
            self.validate_condition(
                True, "OpenBMC utils stress %d - starting" % n
            )

            try:
                status = self.host.oob.verify_valid_fan_info()
            except Exception as e:
                raise Exception("Failed, %s" % (str(e)))

            self.validate_condition(
                status is True, "OpenBMC fan-util get %d cycle" % n
            )

            self.execute_fanutil_set_option()
            self.validate_condition(True, "OpenBMC fan-util set %d cycle" % n)



[docs]    def execute_fanutil_set_option(self):
        for parameter in range(len(self.desired_percentage_to_set)):
            self.log_info("Executing fan_util --set option")
            self.log_info(
                "Setting the fan %s in zone %s to the value: %s" % (
                    self.fan_number_to_set[parameter],
                    self.zone_number_to_set[parameter],
                    self.desired_percentage_to_set[parameter]
                )
            )
            self.host.oob.set_fan_speed(
                self.desired_percentage_to_set[parameter],
                self.zone_number_to_set[parameter],
                self.fan_number_to_set[parameter]
            )




[docs]def main():
    test = OpenbmcVerifyFanutil()
    test.lifecycle()



if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
